channel.title: ~~ Coders Read please ~~ (508)
channel.description:
okay i have been coding my new 508 server for about a week now and i have this problem and i have worked on it for around 2 days now. The Problem is that I'm trying to make a meat tenderizer have the special attack, animation, gfx, and stance of a gmaul. and its very frustrating, i have looked at all of the 508 tutorials on the moparscape forum, and even tried to look into other server files to see if i could find my mistake. But no matter how hard i try, i can't get it to work at all... When i originally started to work on the meat tenderizer, it didn't even work like a weapon, and you couldnt even wield it. But i have managed to make it a wield able weapon, and it still looks like my player is trying to hold a sword. :(
So if anyone can help me with this i would appreciate it... thanks.

item.title: ~~ Coders Read please ~~ (508)
item.dc:creator: @Jesta1 Jesta
item.description:
@Jesta1 wrote:

Can someone please answer this? I have a similar problem…
